name: Self-hosted gateway
description: Use a self-hosted gateway when you need APIM policy execution close to backends that are not reachable from the managed gateway path.
considerations: Placement: deploy near backends (on-prem, Kubernetes, VMs).
Connectivity: define how gateway reaches the APIM management plane and how clients reach the gateway.
Operations: patching and upgrades, scaling, logging, and certificate rotation.

links.title: APIM resources hub (tools and deployment resources)

nextSteps: Confirm which policies must run at the self-hosted gateway.
Define a rollout strategy (blue/green or phased) for gateway upgrades.
